docs.lead_paragraph: WASHINGTON, May 2.--In an effort gradually to abate the national menace of stream pollution the Senate has passed the Barkley bill which makes a start toward a new and helpful method of cooperation among Federal, State and municipal governments and individual citizens.

headline.main: In The Nation; The Senate Prevents Stretch of Commerce Clause

docs.snippet: WASHINGTON, May 2.--In an effort gradually to abate the national menace of stream pollution the Senate has passed the Barkley bill which makes a start toward a new and helpful method of cooperation among Federal, State and municipal governments and...

docs.lead_paragraph: HERE is a doctor's book to make doctors and laymen alike sit up and take notice--"A Doctor for the People," by Michael A. Shadid, M.D. No doubt it will be assailed by conservatives within the profession as an excited and onesided book, but at that there must be hundreds of physicians who know next to nothing about the case at issue, and certainly the public at large knows even less.

headline.main: BOOKS OF THE TIMES; Oklahoma Hospital
